title: Celebrity Dirt
description: Getting the scoop can be deadly...Landing a big story at Celebrity Dirt, Chicago’s hottest tabloid, is cutthroat. After three long years of hustling, it’s finally my turn to shine.The plan?Crash an exclusive party, steal an identity, dig up the dirt, and make my name. Easy, right?Wrong.The person I’m impersonating has a target on their back from Chicago’s most dangerous mob boss. And if that wasn’t bad enough, his brooding, dangerously sexy right-hand man seems determined to keep me alive—on his terms.Now, I’m caught in a deadly game of cat and mouse, stuck between chasing the scoop of a lifetime and following his rules to stay breathing.The real danger? Trying not to fall for the man who could ruin everything—including me.
author: J.D. Hollyfield
